name: Radiance Botanical Moisturizing Cream
description:
Eco-Friendly, All Natural,
Certified Organic and Preservative Free

Radiance Botanical Moisturizing Cream is made with oils incredibly rich in ANTIOXIDANTS, VITAMINS and NUTRIENTS, formulated for mature, sensitive skin.

The essential oils we chose for Radiance Botanical Moisturizing Cream, are renowned for CELL REJUVENATION and COLLAGEN PRODUCTION.

name: Cleansing Grains
description:
CLEANSING GRAINS

Sweet Song Cleansing Grains are a wonderful FACIAL CLEANSER and a GENTLE EXFOLIANT, suitable for even the most SENSITIVE skin.

Our Cleansing Grains were inspired from the thought of what people washed  their skin with before the dawn of `soap`......  Slippery roots, ancient clays, ground flowers and grains.

Use Sweet Song Cleansing Grains as an alternative to soap.  

Wash your face with Certified Organic ground roses, roots, grains and the gentlest of all the clays! How LUXURIOUS!! 

Mix with a small amount of water or a Botanical Hydrosol to create a nice slippery consistency. 

For a Facial Mask
Add egg whites, mashed fresh organic fruit, avocado or whatever you choose to create a rich tightening, cleansing and refreshing Face Mask.

In  Days of Old, people washed their skin with the saponin rich roots of plants, ground flowers and grains.
Sweet Song CLEANSING GRAINS  take you back to the good old days.

PURE, TRUE AND SIMPLE WAYS

Ingredients:
*Ground Oats, Kaolin Clay, Australian Beige Clay, *Ground Rose Petals, *Marshmallow Root powder, *Essential Oil of Lavender.

*Certified Organic

name: Rose Hip and Pomegranate Face Serum
description:
Sweet Song Face Serum is made with Pure, High Quality, Certified Organic Oils that are renowned for DEEP TISSUE MOISTURE allowing for skin repair and rejuvenation. 

Sweet Song Face Serums also offer you the spiritual properties of age old oils that RESTORE, RENEW, PROTECT and STRENGTHEN your Spirit and Mind.

Rose Otto, Frankincense and Myrrh

*Certified Organic
**Ethically Wild Crafted

name: Pure Steam Distilled Botanical Waters
description:
Pure Steam Distilled Botanical Waters
All Natural, Food Quality, Eco - Friendly!!

ROSE WATER
Bulgarian Rose water has been used for centuries as a natural toner and tightener. Rose Water leaves the skin with a soft, radiant, healthy glow.
It is incredibly old fashioned and a beautiful fragrance.... absolutely timeless.

CHAMOMILE WATER
Chamomile water is a gentle, soothing hydrosol used to refresh and calm the skin. It is particularly helpful with dry and sensitive conditions.
It is also recommended as a compress for reddened or tired eyes and is used as a mild and gentle brightening agent.

EDEN WATER 
This is a Sweet Song original created with a mix of Rose and Chamomile Waters and a unique blend of therapeutic grade essential oils.

name: Face Mask
description:
Revitalizing Face Mask

2oz Bottle - 12.00
Make it a Kit - 25.00

Brightening and Stimulating

Sweet Song Revitalising Face Mask TINGLES, MOISTURIZES and NOURISHES your skin, leaving you with  brightened and energized skin. 

Add floral Hydrosol and Face Oil to make it truly an amazing mask!

Directions
2 tsp. Face Mask
2 tsp. Floral Hydrosol
1 tsp. Face Oil
Mix together in a bowl until you reach a mud like consistency. Apply to face. Relax for 15-20 minutes. Rinse off with warm water. Apply Face Serum or Moisturizing Cream and a spritz of hydrosol to finish.

Sweet Song Face Mask is made with Organic Rose Petals, Rose Hip Extract, Rhassoul Clay, Seaweed, Marshmallow Root and Pure Therapeutic Grade Essential Oils of Rosemary, Carrot Seed, Geranium and Myrrh.

description:

Aluminum Free and Long Lasting

Sweet Song All Natural Deodorant Cream is made with your health in mind!

All Natural, Aluminum Free and Effective Odour Eliminator

Applying deodorant daily to an area full of lymphatic tissue is an opportunity to do something GOOD for yourself rather than something harmful. 

Based on Frugally Sustainable's recipe, Sweet Song All Natural Deodorant Cream is free of Aluminum and contains ingredients that are healthy and helpful for lymphatic health as well as effective odour protection.

Made with Certified Organic Shea Butter, Olive Oil, Non-Nano Zinc Oxide, Arrow Root Powder, Bees Wax, Vitamin E and Pure Therapeutic Grade Essential Oils of; Rosemary, Lavender and Frankincense.

name: Lip Balm
description:
PEPPERMINT LIP BALM

100% Certified Organic

Tubes

You can actually FEEL Sweet Song Lip Balm working! 

This lip balm is Powerfully Pure, Ultra Moisturizing and Intense.

We infuse Certified Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil with fresh peppermint leaf, soothing Calendula Flowers and moisturizing Marshmallow Root, to create one of the highest quality lip balms available.

Also suitable for use on chapped and even cracked skin.

For extreme chapped lips, apply a heavy amount at night before going to sleep. 

Remember to drink lots of water. Especially if you are dealing with dry skin on your hands and feet. 

A good guide for understanding how much water you need to drink daily, take your weight in pounds and divide that number by 2 ...  that is the amount of OUNCES OF WATER you should be drinking daily!

name: Headache Soother
description:

Slider Tin - 7.00

Peppermint is an amazing stimulant which draws the circulation to the area of application. Lavender relaxes and dilates capillaries to help ease mild to moderate headaches. 
To use : massage in to temples, forehead or back of neck .... Wherever you feel the tension.

name: Sore Muscle Salve
description:
Sore Muscle Salve 
Sprains, Aches and Pains

2 ounce Tin

This salve works so deep! 

Arnica is specific for the muscle tissue.  St. John’s is specific for the nervous tissue. Together with analgesic, anti-inflammatory Hops and Mullein this salve helps to alleviate pain and inflammation.

This is an excellent salve for aches and pains, sore tired and sprained muscles.

Ingredients
*Hypericum Perforatum (St. John’s Wort) flowering tops, *Arnica Montana (Arnica) flowers,* Humulus lupulus L. (Hops), and *Verbascum thapsus (Mullein) infused Certified Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil, *Bees Wax, Essential Oils of, Eucalyptus, Black Pepper, Frankincense and Juniper.

*Certified Organic or Organically grown.

name: Eczema Salve
description:
Eczema Salve
Eczema, Psoriasis 

2 ounce Tin
       
This nutritious salve is an excellent remedy for any itchy, inflamed, irritated, red skin conditions. Used with success for eczema and allergic reactions. Would also be appropriate for treating: psoriasis, skin ulcers, cradle cap or any irritated skin disease.   

 Ingredients
 
*Elder flower,* Calendula flower, *Chickweed, *Viola, *Marshmallow root, leaf and flower infused *Extra Virgin Olive oil,*Apricot Kernel oil, *Bees Wax, vitamin E, essential oil of *Lavender.

*Certified Organic or Organically grown.

name: Poison Ivy Salve
description:
Poison Ivy Salve
Poison Ivy, Oak and Sumac

Made with Jewel Weed which is the antidote that reverses the effect of Poison Ivy’s rash-causing oils. 

Jewel Weed is a traditional antidote and treatment for poison ivy, oak and sumac. Applying Jewel Weed will stop the poison ivy rash from happening. Also used traditionally for many other skin disorders. Marshmallow is demulcent (soothing), anti-inflammatory and expectorant, and is one of the best plants for soothing sore and inflamed membranes. Marshmallow has the ability to move healthy moisture in while moving the unhealthy moisture out. This salve has been tested and works amazingly!
Ingredients: Impatiens Capensis (Jewelweed) aerial parts and root, Althaea Officicinalis (Marshmallow) root and leaf infused organic Olive oil, bees wax, vitamin E.
Testimony
I had never had poison ivy and felt I must be immune to it, so quite arrogantly I volunteered to gather the jewelweed for this salve. Jewelweed grows along with poison ivy and I was gathering plants knee and elbow deep in the poison ivy . Later that evening I started itching above my eye like I have never itched before! After a while, with the itch not going away I realized it might be poison ivy so I went to look in the mirror and sure enough a blister had formed. I went into the shower with some alcohol and soap and washed with each 3x. Then I applied the jewelweed/marshmallow salve generously and went to bed. When I awoke I felt the other eye itching and assumed I would be swollen and looking deformed. When I went to the mirror I was shocked to see that the blister had disappeared completely. I continued to apply the salve for a few days to the area and any area that felt itchy, many times a day. No rash or any sign of poison ivy manifested.

Ingredients:
*Jewelweed Aerial Parts, *Marshmallow root, Leaf and Flower infused *Extra Virgin Olive oil,* Bees Wax.

*Certified Organic or Organically grown.

name: Herbal Teas
description:
100% Certified Organic Herbal Tea

Integrity - Multi-Vitamin Everyday Tonic

Serenity - Day Time Calming/ Strengthening Tea

Sleep - A Night Time Calming / Sedating Tea

Slimming Tea - Cleansing and Balancing Tea

Cold & Flu Tea - Elder Flower, Peppermint & Dandelion

Description & Ingredients

Integrity

A rich nutritive tonic tea.

"Tonic" refers to the action the plant has of toning or strengthening a particular type of cell or system in the body. 

"Nutritive" refers to the nourishment of cells. 
Integrity is formulated with nutrients in mind. 
 
Ingredients: Stinging Nettle, Chickweed, Dandelion Leaf, Lemon Balm, Peppermint

Serenity - This tea is a wonderful blend of herbs helpful during times of stress and anxiety. 

It contains gentle yet effective properties that nourish and calm the nervous system and support the heart. 

Serenity is a very effective formula for mild to moderate depression.

This tea is recommended for day time use.

 Ingredients
*St. John's Wort, *Nettle, *Oat Straw, *Lemon Balm, *Siberian Ginseng and *Lavender.

Sleep - A sedating night time tea, excellent for restlessness and insomnia.
Ingredients: 

Slimming Tea - A wonderful tasting mild tea blended with Certified Organic Herbs traditionally used for breaking down fat,  removing toxins and balancing blood sugar.
 
A great energizing tea with Siberian Ginseng which is recommended for daily use to protect the body from the effects of stress.

Ingredients: *Chickweed, *Dandelion Leaf, *Siberian Ginseng, *Marshmallow Root, *Orange Peel, *Cinnamon Bark, *Fennel Seed

name: Blessed Bitters
description:
Blessed Bitters
Herbal digestive tonic.

A foundational step toward good health.

125 ml Bottle 

In herbal medicine there is actually a class of herbs called ‘bitters’.  
 Here are some of the actions of bitter herbs on the body:

* Bitters stimulate the activity of the liver, which is a very important organ for detoxifying and filtering harmful substances from the body.
* Bitters strengthen poor digestion, which in turn helps the body to absorb nutrients, vitamins and minerals and to eliminate waste properly.
* Bitters help the body to break down fats by stimulating a release of bile into the intestines.
* Bitters stimulate the gastric mucosa (stomach lining) to secrete the digestive juices needed to digest food properly.
* Bitters regulate the secretion of insulin and glycogen by the pancreas, and therefore can be helpful in managing hypoglycemia and diabetes.
* Bitters stimulate repair of the stomach lining so can be useful in reversing ulcers.
* Bitters stimulate the appetite by triggering receptor sites on the tongue, which are taste buds that are designed especially to receive bitter flavors.

What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise. -Oscar Wilde

Bitters stimulate all digestive secretions, saliva, acids, enzymes, hormones, bile and so forth. Each of these acts as a solvent to break down food for absorption, and the quantity and the quality of these fluids ensure proper nutrition. Inadequate production of these secretions is common in modern cultures (cultures lacking bitters in their diet).
When first tasted, bitters promote salivation, which begins the process of digestion by breaking down starches and beginning to work on fats. Taste receptors in the mouth recognize the presence of bitters and trigger a system wide reaction throughout the digestive tract.
In the stomach, sufficient hormones, acids, and enzymes are needed to help breakdown proteins, and carbohydrates, and to free up minerals for assimilation. Bitters stimulate the production of gastric acid. Inadequate stomach acid will prevent the uptake of minerals, which will in turn rob the body of essential nutrition needed for wellness. Low acids also weaken stomach tissues, and is often the foundational cause of esoph-geal reflex(though most people mistakenly believe they have too much acid). It is well known that as people pass into their elder years they produce less stomach acid. Restoring bitters to the diet will allow the body to produce its own acid. Bitters also increase the production of the enzyme pepsin, which helps to break down proteins and intrinsic factor, which is essential for the absorption of Vit. B12
Bitters act on the both the pancreas, and liver/gallbladder, helping to normalize blood sugar and promote the production and release of pancreatic enzymes and bile which ensure good digestion of fats and oils. A healthy flow of bile helps rid the liver of waste products, prevents the formation of gall stones and emulsifies lipids, which the pancreatic enzymes then breakdown along with proteins and carbohydrates for absorption in the small intestines. Deficient bile and sluggish liver/gallbladder function can often be the cause of chronic constipation. Bitters also promote secretion of digestive juices within the small intestines, further aiding bowel transit and nutrient assimilation. They strengthen the tone of tissues throughout the digestive tract.

People associate bitterness with negative virtues such as spite and resentment, and yet, what emotional bitterness really originates from is stagnation; the inability to release a belief or feeling that no longer serves, but rather hinders our wellness, development and growth. The bitter person is oppressed by avoidance of the very thing they cannot let go. Only by embracing bitterness can we learn the very thing it has to offer-to teach us. In this embrace we find it rich in medicine. As it applies to herbs, these same factors resonate. We avoid bitterness because its taste seems uncomfortable, it challenges us. And yet, when embraced we find what it offers us is an abundance of medicine, which allows us to escape from a state of stagnation and release those things both physiological and emotional that hinder the blossoming of our wellness.
Summarized from Jim McDonald's 
"Blessed Bitters"http://www.herbcraft.org/bitters.pdf
